mapper.sql: id, speed, winddirection, temperature, humidity, pressure, minuterainfall, hourrainfall, dayrainfall, rainfallaccumulation, solarintensity, cjsj, bz, sm
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from meteorological_data
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into meteorological_data (id, speed, winddirection, temperature, humidity, pressure, minuterainfall, hourrainfall, dayrainfall, rainfallaccumulation, solarintensity, cjsj, bz, sm) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{winddirection,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{humidity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pressure,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{minuterainfall,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hourrainfall,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dayrainfall,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rainfallaccumulation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{solarintensity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
